236:3: satyatyāgopaśamaprajñādibhirguṃṇātiśayairlokahitārthamudyacchamānaḥ kila bodhisattvaḥ kadācicchibīnāṃ rājā babhūva sākṣāddharma iva vinaya iva piteva prajānāmupakārapravṛttaḥ|
236:5: pitreva putraḥ kṣitipena tena nananda lokadvitaye'pi lokaḥ||1||
236:6: samaprabhāvā svajane jane ca dharmānugā tasya hi daṇḍanītiḥ|
236:7: adharmyamāvṛtya janasya mārgaṃ sopānamāleva divo babhūva||2||
236:9: sarvātmanā dharmapathe'bhireme tasyopamardaṃ ca parairna sehe||3||
236:10: atha tasya rājñaḥ pauramukhyasya duhitā śrīriva vigrahavatī sākṣādratirivāpsarasāmanyatameva parayā rūpalāvaṇyasaṃpadopetā paramadarśanīyā strīratnasaṃmatā babhūva|
236:13: ataśca tasyā unmādayantītyeva bāndhavā nāma cakruḥ|
236:14: atha tasyāḥ pitā rājñaḥ saṃviditaṃ kārayāmāsa-strīratnaṃ te deva viṣaye prādurbhūtam|
236:15: yatastatpratigrahaṃ visarjanaṃ vā prati devaḥ pramāṇamiti|
236:16: atha sa rājā strīlakṣaṇavido brāhmaṇān samādideśa-paśyantvenāṃ tatrabhavantaḥ kimasāvasmadyogyā na veti|
236:17: atha tasyāḥ pitā tānbrāhmaṇān svabhavanamabhinīyonmādayantīmuvāca-bhadre svayameva brāhmaṇān pariveṣayeti|
236:18: sā tatheti pratiśrutya yathākramaṃ brāhmaṇān pariveṣayitumupacakrame|
236:22: yadā ca naiva śaknuvanti sma pratisaṃkhyānadhīranibhṛtamavasthātuṃ,
236:24: athaiṣāṃ cakṣuṣpathādutsārya svāṃ duhitaraṃ sa gṛhapatiḥ svayameva brāhmaṇān pariveṣya visarjayāmāsa|
236:25: atha teṣāṃ buddhirabhavat-kṛtyārūpamiva khalvidamatimanoharamasyā dārikāyā rūpacāturyam|
236:26: yato naināṃ rājā draṣṭumapyarhati kutaḥ punaḥ patnītvaṃ gamayitum|
236:27: anayā hi rūpaśobhayā niyatamasyonmāditahṛdayasya dharmārthakāryapravṛttervisrasyamānotsāhasya rājakāryakālātikramāḥ prajānāṃ hitasukhodayapathamupapīḍayantaḥ parābhavāya syuḥ|
236:30: tasmādidamatra prāptakālamiti yathāprastāvamupetya rājñe nivedayāmāsuḥ-dṛṣṭāsmābhirmahārāja sā kanyakā|
236:34: kuladvayasyāpi hi ninditā strī yaśo vibhūtiṃ ca tiraskaroti|
236:35: nimagnacandreva niśā sameghā śobhāṃ vibhāgaṃ ca divaspṛthivyoḥ||7||
236:37: na ca me kulānurūpeti tasyāṃ vinivṛttābhilāṣo babhūva|
236:38: anarthitāṃ tu vijñāya rājñaḥ sa gṛhapatistāṃ dārikāṃ tasyaiva rājño'mātyāyābhipāragāya prāyacchat|
236:39: atha kadācitsa rājā kramāgatāṃ kaumudīṃ svasminpuravare niṣaktaśobhāṃ draṣṭumutsukamanā rathavaragataḥ siktasaṃmṛṣṭarathyāntarāpaṇamucchritavicitradhvajapatākaṃ samantataḥ puṣpopahāraśabalabhūmibhāgadhavalaṃ pravṛttanṛttagītahāsyalāsyavāditraṃ puṣpadhūpacūrṇavāsamālyāsavasnānānulepanāmodaprasṛtasurabhigandhi prasāritavividharucirapaṇyaṃ tuṣṭapuṣṭojjvalataraveṣapaurajānapadasaṃbādharājamārgaṃ puravaramanuvicaraṃstasyāmātyasya bhavanasamīpamupajagāma|
236:40: athonmādayantyapalakṣaṇā kilāhamityanena rājñāvadhūteti samutpannāmarṣā rājadarśanakutūhalena nāma saṃdṛśyamānarūpaśobhā vidyudiva ghanaśikharaṃ harmyatalamavabhāsayantī vyatiṣṭhata|
236:42: atha tasya rājñaḥ puravaravibhūtidarśanakutūhalaprasṛtā dṛṣṭirabhimukhasthitāyāṃ sahasaiva tasyāmapatat|
236:50: iti vicārayata eva tasya rājñastaddarśanāvitṛptanayanasya sa rathastaṃ deśamativartamāno na manorathānukūlo babhūva|
236:51: atha sa rājā śūnyahṛdaya iva tadgataikāgramanāḥ svabhavanamupetya manmathākṣiptadhṛtiḥ sunandaṃ sārathiṃ rahasi paryapṛcchat-
236:53: kā sā tatra vyarociṣṭa vidyutsita ivāmbude||11||
236:55: tasya tadgṛhaṃ tasyaiva ca sā bhāryā kirīṭavatsasya duhitā unmādayantī nāmeti|
236:56: tadupaśrutya sa rājā parabhāryeti vitānībhūtahṛdayaścintāstimitanayano dīrghamuṣṇamabhiniśvasya tadarpitamanāḥ śanairātmagatamuvāca-
236:60: sthitaṃ tasyāṃ hi me cetaḥ sā prabhutvena tatra vā||13||
236:67: iti sa rājā madabalavicalitadhṛtirvyavasthāpayannapyātmānamāpāṇḍukṛśatanuḥ pradhyānaviniśvasitavijṛmbhaṇaparaḥ pravyaktamadanākāro babhūva|
236:68: dhṛtyā mahatyāpi niguhyamānaḥ sa bhūpatestasya manovikāraḥ|
236:70: atheṅgitākāragrahaṇanipuṇamatirabhipārago'mātyastaṃ rājño vṛttāntaṃ sakāraṇamupalabhya snehāttadatyayāśaṅko jānānaścātibalatāṃ madanasya rahasi rājānaṃ saṃviditaṃ samupetya kṛtābhyanujño vijñāpayāmāsa-
236:72: māmāha nāvaiṣi nṛpasya kasmādunmādayantyāṃ hṛdayaṃ niviṣṭam||17||
236:77: puṇyāccyutaḥ syāmamaro na cāsmi vidyācca naḥ pāpamidaṃ jano'pi|
236:78: tadviprayogācca mano jvalaṃtsvāṃ vahniḥ purā kakṣamiva kṣiṇoti||19||
236:80: tadyasya hetorabudhā bhajante tasyaiva hetorna budhā bhajante||20||
236:84: kīrtyuparodhāvakāśamapi cātra devasya na paśyāmi| kutaḥ ?
236:88: svāmyarthacaryārjitayā hi tuṣṭyā nirantare cetasi ko vighātaḥ|
236:89: yataḥ sukāmaṃ kuru deva kāmamalaṃ madutpīḍanaśaṅkayā te||23||
236:98: adṛśyamāno'pi hi pāpamācaranviṣaṃ niṣevyeva kathaṃ samṛdhnuyāt|
236:99: na taṃ na paśyanti viśuddhacakṣuṣo divaukasaścaiva narāśca yoginaḥ||26||
236:101: śraddadhīta ka etacca yathāsau tava na priyā|
236:102: tāṃ parityajya sadyo vā vighātaṃ na samāpnuyāḥ||27||
236:104: saputradāro dāso'haṃ svāmī tvaṃ daivataṃ ca me|
236:107: mama priyā kāmada kāmameṣā tenaiva ditsāmi ca tubhyamenām|
236:108: priyaṃ hi dattvā labhate paratra prakarṣaramyāṇi janaḥ priyāṇi||29||
236:112: ahaṃ hi śastraṃ niśitaṃ viśeyaṃ hutāśanaṃ visphuradarciṣaṃ vā|
236:113: na tveva dharmādadhigamya lakṣmīṃ śakṣyāmi tatraiva punaḥ prahartuṃm||30||
236:114: abhipāraga uvāca-yadyenāṃ madbhāryeti devo na pratigrahītumicchatyayamahamasyāḥ sarvajanaprārthanāviruddhaveśyāvratamādiśāmi|
236:122: dharmātyayo me yadi kaścidevaṃ janāpavādaḥ sukhaviplavo vā|
236:124: tvattaḥ paraṃ cāhavanīyamanyaṃ loke na paśyāmi mahīmahendra|
236:125: unmādayantī mama puṇyavṛddhyai tāṃ dakṣiṇāmṛtvigiva pratīccha||33||
236:127: ata eva tu tvāṃ viśeṣato nopekṣitumarhāmi|
236:129: lokasya yo nādriyate'pavādaṃ dharmānapekṣaḥ parataḥ phalaṃ vā|
236:130: jano na viśvāsamupaiti tasmindhruvaṃ ca lakṣmyāpi vivarjyate saḥ||34||
236:132: mā te rociṣṭa dharmasya jīvitārthe vyatikramaḥ|
236:136: eko'pyanutpīḍya parānato'haṃ dharme sthitaḥ svārthadhuraṃ prapatsye||36||
236:137: abhipāraga uvāca-svāmyarthaṃ bhaktivaśena carato mama tāvadatra ka evādharmāvakāśaḥ syāddevasya vā dīyamānāmenāṃ pratigṛhṇataḥ|
236:138: yataḥ sanaigamajānapadāḥ śibayaḥ kimatrādharma iti brūyuḥ|
236:141: idaṃ tvatra cintayitavyam-sanaigamajānapadānāṃ vā śibīnāṃ tava mama vā ko'smākaṃ dharmavittama iti|
236:144: trivargavidyātiśayārthatattvaṃ tvayi sthitaṃ deva bṛhaspatau ca| 37||
236:145: rājovāca-tena hi na māmatra pratārayitumarhasi| kutaḥ?
236:146: narādhipānāṃ cariteṣvadhīnaṃ lokasya yasmādahitaṃ hitaṃ ca|
236:147: bhaktiṃ prajānāmanucintya tasmātkīrtikṣame satpatha eva raṃsye||38||
236:148: jihmaṃ śubhaṃ vā vṛṣabhapracāraṃ gāvo'nugā yadvadanuprayānti|
236:153: iti prajānāṃ hitamīkṣamāṇaḥ svaṃ caiva dharmaṃ vimalaṃ yaśaśca|
236:154: necchāmi cittasya vaśena gantumahaṃ hi netā vṛṣavatprajānām||41||
236:155: athābhipārago'mātyastena rājño'vasthānena prasāditamanāḥ praṇamya rājānaṃ prāñjalirityuvāca-
236:162: tadevaṃ tīvraduḥkhāturāṇāmapi satāṃ nīcamārganiṣpraṇayatā bhavati svadhairyāvaṣṭambhāt svabhyastadharmasaṃjñatvācceti dhairyadharmābhyāse ca yogaḥ kārya iti|
